Name: Absorb Elements
Casting time: 1 reaction, which you take when you take acid, cold, ethereal, fire, lightning, shadow or sonic damage

Name: Animal Friendship
Components: V, S, F, M (some food, which the target consumes)

Name: Snare
Components: V, S, M (25 feet of rope, which the spell consumes)

Name: Cordon of Arrows
Components: V, S, M (four or more arrows or bolts, which the spell consumes)

Name: Direct Barrage
Components: V, S, M (pieces of ammunition or thrown weapons)

Name: Lightning Arrow
Components: V, S, M (a piece of ammunition that the spell consumes)

Name: Nondetection
Components: V, S, M (apatite dust worth at least 25 gp sprinkled over the target, which the spell consumes)

Name: Summon Animals
Components: V, S, M (a handful of diaspore dust, which the spell consumes, or a diaspore)

Name: Stoneskin
Components: V, S, M (a peridot worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Summon Woodland Beings
Components: V, S, F, M (diaspore dust, which the spell consumes, or a whole diaspore gemstone)

Name: Shadow Volley
Components: V, S, M (one piece of ammunition or one thrown weapon)

Name: Steel Wind Strike
Components: S, M (a metal melee weapon worth at least 0.1 gp)

Name: Swift Quiver
Components: V, S, M (a quiver containing at least two pieces of ammunition)
